mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE VALUES ( notice_no_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeCont}, DEFAULT, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no as noticeNo, member_id as memberId, notice_category as noticeCategory, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_cont as noticeCont, notice_date as noticeDate, notice_del_yn as noticeDelYN from notice LEFT JOIN member USING(member_no)
